articles.title: Motilal Oswal: Equitas Holdings’ Collection Efficiency Improving, Asset Quality Concerns Remain - BloombergQuint
articles.description: Equitas Holdings’ net profit of Rs 1 billion in Q2 FY21 came on the back of higher NII, as margins expanded and provisions fell.
